li.a: Board of Trustees Agendas and Minutes
Important Notes from the Health Office

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: tahoma, sans-serif; font-size: small; text-align: center;
div.span:
Due to the current Covid-19 situation we have decided to push out the dates for our lottery application and lottery drawing by 1 week.
Applications are now due by April 10, 2020.
Lottery will be held on April 30, 2020. Result letters will be mailed to all applicants within a week of the drawing.

br.br:
PLEASE REFER TO THE DOCUMENTS AND LINKS BELOW TO LEARN MORE ABOUT OCS AND HOW TO APPLY FOR THE NEXT SCHOOL YEAR.
Click HERE for information OCS and our Frequently Asked Questions.
Click HERE for the 2020-2021 Application PDF.
Click HERE for the 2020-2021 Application ONLINE FORM.
Click HERE for all relevant dates related to applying to Odyssey.
Click HERE for a presentation about Odyssey.
SPECIAL BOARD MEETING AGENDA - CLICK HERE

div.p: Odyssey Community School would like to welcome you to our brand new website! You can also download our new Mobile App by clicking here. Like us on Facebook and follow us on Twitter to receive updates on school information!
